stories.original_headline: Scientists discover why high altitude protects against diabetes
stories.original_summary: Living at high altitude appears to protect against diabetes, and scientists have finally discovered the reason. When oxygen levels drop, red blood cells switch into a new metabolic mode and absorb large amounts of glucose from the blood. This helps the body cope with thin air while also reducing blo
stories.fantasy_headline: Mountain Air Magic Fights the Sweet Sickness!
stories.fantasy_story: The Grand Alchemists' Guild has unveiled a secret of the high mountain peaks! It seems the thin air up there helps guard against the common 'Sweet Sickness.' When the life-giving humors encounter less breath, they magically draw sweet essences from the blood, strengthening the body against illness.

stories.original_headline: Generative AI analyzes medical data faster than human research teams
stories.original_summary: Researchers tested whether generative AI could handle complex medical datasets as well as human experts. In some cases, the AI matched or outperformed teams that had spent months building prediction models. By generating usable analytical code from precise prompts, the systems dramatically reduced t
stories.fantasy_headline: Enchanted Scrolls Outwit Sages in Healing Lore!
stories.fantasy_story: An ancient Oracle Engine, powered by arcane scripts, can now decipher complex healing lore faster than the wisest Sages! Tested against healer guilds, the enchanted scrolls matched or surpassed their long-held divinations. This new magic greatly speeds up understanding ailment patterns.

stories.original_summary: Arturia launched a new version of its flagship effects suite, FX Collection, which includes two new plugins, EFX Ambient and Pitch Shifter-910. FX Collection 6 also marks the introduction of an Intro version with a selection of six effects covering the basics for $99. That pales in comparison to the
stories.fantasy_headline: Arturia's Guild Unveils New Enchantments for Aspiring Wizards!
stories.fantasy_story: Arturia's Guild has released a grand new collection of magical enchantments, including two powerful new spells: EFX Ambient and the Pitch Shifter-910. An 'Apprentice's Set' is now available for just 99 gold coins, offering basic enchantments for budding mages. This makes advanced spellcasting more accessible than ever!
